update t_tutor set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_login = #{lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, curr_distr_id = #{currDistrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, curr_addr = #{currAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth_city_id = #{birthCityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, id_card_num = #{idCardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tutor_type = #{tutorType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, univ_id = #{univId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card_pic = #{idCardPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stu_cert_pic = #{stuCertPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teach_cert_pic = #{teachCertPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_account = #{payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, university = #{university,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teach_city_id = #{teachCityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: t.id id, t.user_name user_name, t.photo photo, t.status status, t.last_login last_login, t.real_name real_name, t.gender gender, t.major major, t.tutor_type tutor_type, t.intro intro, t.university university, ts.subject_id subject_id, s.name subject_name, tg.grade_id grade_id, g.name grade_name, td.distr_id distr_id, d.name distr_name, tm.mode_id mode_id, m.name mode_name

t.id id, t.user_name user_name, t.password password, t.photo photo, t.status status, t.last_login last_login, t.real_name real_name, t.gender gender, t.phone phone, t.email email, t.qq qq, t.curr_distr_id curr_distr_id, t.curr_addr curr_addr, t.birth_city_id birth_city_id, t.id_card_num id_card_num, t.major major, t.tutor_type tutor_type, t.univ_id univ_id, t.intro intro, t.id_card_pic id_card_pic, t.stu_cert_pic stu_cert_pic, t.teach_cert_pic teach_cert_pic, t.pay_account pay_account, t.university university, t.teach_city_id teach_city_id, ts.subject_id subject_id, s.name subject_name, tg.grade_id grade_id, g.name grade_name, td.distr_id distr_id, d.name distr_name, tm.mode_id mode_id, m.name mode_name
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_tutor t JOIN t_tutor_subject ts ON t.id = ts.tutor_id JOIN t_subject s ON ts.subject_id = s.id JOIN t_tutor_grade tg ON t.id = tg.tutor_id JOIN t_grade g ON tg.grade_id = g.id JOIN t_tutor_distr td ON t.id = td.tutor_id JOIN t_district d ON td.distr_id = d.id JOIN t_tutor_mode tm ON t.id = tm.tutor_id JOIN t_mode m ON tm.mode_id = m.id WHERE t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
